info.title: Localess Open API Specification
info.description: Fetch data from Localess via REST API

get.description: The endpoint allows you to retrieve all translations by locale. In case Locale is not present in the Localess, it will return the default locale translations. In case cache version is not present, it will redirect to the latest version.

parameters.name: spaceId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the Space object.

200.description: Return the Translations Object if the request succeeded.

get.description: The endpoint allows you to retrieve all Content summery metadata mainly used to recreate content tree. In case cache version is not present, it will redirect to the latest version.

parameters.name: spaceId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the Space object.

parameters.name: kind
parameters.description: Content Kind. FOLDER or DOCUMENT. If not provided, it will return all.

parameters.name: excludeChildren
parameters.description: If **true**, exclude all sub slugs, otherwise include all content under current selected **parent slug**.

200.description: Return the Links Object if the request succeeded.

get.description: The endpoint allows you to retrieve a specific Content by the content full slug. In case cache version is not present, it will redirect to the latest version.

parameters.name: spaceId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the Space object.

200.description: Return the Content Object if the request succeeded.

get.description: The endpoint allows you to retrieve a specific Content by Unique identifier for the Content object. In case cache version is not present, it will redirect to the latest version.

parameters.name: spaceId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the Space object.

parameters.name: contentId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the Content object.

200.description: Return the Content Object if the request succeeded.

get.description: The endpoint allows you to retrieve a specific Asset by Unique identifier for the Asset object.

parameters.name: spaceId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the Space object.

parameters.name: assetId
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the Asset object.

parameters.name: w
parameters.description: Asset width, in case it is a image (In Pixel). Otherwise it will be ignored.

parameters.name: download
parameters.description: In case you wish to download the asset.

parameters.name: thumbnail
parameters.description: In case you have a video or animated image like WebP/Gif, and you wish to generate thumbnail.

Translations.description: Key-Value Object. Where Key is Translation ID and Value is Translated Content

ContentAsset.description: Content Asset define reference to a Asset.

ContentLink.description: Content Link define reference to a Link.

type.description: Define the type of Link. URL for external links and Content for internal links.

target.description: Define the target of the link. _blank for new tab and _self for same tab.

uri.description: If type is content, then it will be Content ID. Otherwise it will be URL.

ContentReference.description: Content Reference define reference to a Content.

uri.description: Unique identifier for the Content Document.

ContentRichText.description: Content RichText define content as JSON Object.

type.description: Define the type of Content Node

content.text: Wow, this editor instance exports its content as JSON.

allOf.description: Content define shared object for all possible Content Types.
References of all links used in the content.

ContentMetadata.description: Content Metadata define short information about a Content for navigation reason.

kind.description: Define the type of Content, whether it is a FOLDER or DOCUMENT.

fullSlug.description: Combination of SLUG and Parent SLUG of the Content

createdAt.description: Date and Time at which the Content was created.

updatedAt.description: Date and Time at which the Content was updated.

publishedAt.description: Date and Time at which the Content was published.

Links.description: Key-Value Object. Where Key is Unique identifier for the Content object and Value is Content Metadata.

ContentData.description: ContentData defined Object to connect all possible root Schemas.

_id.description: Unique identifier of a component in a content.

_schema.description: Unique identifier for the Schema object.

schema.description: Unique identifier for the Schema object. Will be deprecated in future in favor of `_schema`.
